QuestData.Title: The Campaign Begins
QuestData.Description: The Legion believes we are still reeling from our loss on the Broken Shore.$B$BLet's prove them wrong.$B$BOur scouts have mapped out the Broken Isles, learning everything we can about each region for our imminent assault.$b$bChoose where to strike first, and you will lead the Unseen Path's efforts personally.
QuestData.LogDescription: Choose an initial assault point on the Command Map
